scripts.say: This is as far as you go. We won't let you get any closer to Kizuna AI.
Miss Eugen? You've also come to the Virtual Mirror Sea? But... why are you wearing your wedding attire...?
Zed, be careful. Something's not right here...
Ahaha~♪ We've come here to protect our beloved Kizuna AI.
Um... We won't let you lay a finger on Miss AI ><
They call us the "Kizuna AI Fleet." We shall be your opponents!
Kizuna AI Fleet, huh... But why are Prinz Eugen and Takao wearing swimsuits...?
P-Please don't mind that...
Is this also caused by that random number generator...?
What do you think? In any case, we won't allow you to touch our Commander, Kizuna AI. If you still insist on coming, steel yourselves!
Tch...! I didn't think they'd have reinforcements like this...
Even their name plates on the dialogue box are different! Kizuna AI must be a commander in her original world, and this is her fleet!
I see, I see! She must have given promise rings to these four! Their nicknames are super cute!
Ikazuchi, now's not the time to admire her taste. We have to find some way to get the upper hand.
Miss Eugen~! We all want to protect AI, right? So, we should work together!
I'm afraid that's not possible.
Huh? Why...?!
Milady's true desire right now is to destroy this world. As her vassals, we must carry out her will.
This kind of dedication... is wrong!
We... we've already made up our mind ><
Looks like... we might have a better shot if we tried to go around them...
Ara? Then, maybe we should do you a favor and let you go? Just kidding~♪ I'd never, ever let you get away~
Shoukaku?! Even if you say that... Ikazuchi isn't scared of you at all!
We won't let you get any closer to AI!
You'll never be able to escape us while fighting off all our other forces!
Wh-wh-wh-what do we do~! Why are they such tryhards~~~~ ><
We're going to have to find some way to hold back the Kizuna AI Fleet while we cut off the power supply...
No, our best bet is to fight them head on. If we take them out, there's nothing stopping us.
So, is this one of those stages where we have multiple win conditions? We can either do the high-power strategy, or the low-cost strategy!
